events.name: WeConnect Official Launch
events.description:
Westermo is officially launching our WeConnect Cloud based VPN Service, you are invited to join us at IOT Asia 2018 happening on the 21st to 22nd March 2018 at the Singapore Expo Hall 3, Booth B21.
Simply RSVP for any of our 3 daily presentation sessions and come with the Eventbrite confirmation order, you will be able to walk away with complimentary Bluetooth speaker.
Date:  21st – 22nd March 2018
Time: 1100 hrs, 1400 hrs, 1600 hrs
Location: IOT Asia 2018, Singapore Expo Hall 3, Westermo Booth B21
Do note that you have to register yourself over at IOT Asia for free trade visitor pass to enter the exhibition area.
http://www.internetofthingsasia.com/registration  See you there
events.location: Singapore Expo Hall 3, 1 Expo Drive, Singapore 486150

events.name: FOSSASIA Meet & Greet + Culture & Exploration Afternoon and Dinner at Lau Pa Sat
events.description: Join FOSSASIA Summit speakers and attendees from around the world for a speakers meet and greet and a cultural and exploration tech walk in Singapore followed by dinner at Lau Pa Sat. We will begin our afternoon at in our partner office in the centre for a short introduction to Singapore tech and start-up scene. Then let's all head out together for the cultural tour, where you will have a chance to visit some historic buildings and landmarks of Singapore. At the end we will have dinner at Lau Pa Sat. Volunteers from the FOSSASIA team will be your guide.Contact person: Nayana +65 9430 3707 AGENDA 3.00 pm: Arrive, Network, Talk at Impacthub3:30 pm: Welcome to FOSSASIA Summit, Administrative info and Intro/Thank the host3:45 pm: Tech scene, start-up ecosystem in Singapore by Host4:00 pm: Speakers Intro (around the table) & networking4:30 pm: Leave for city culture walk tour. Visit historic buildings and landmarks of Singapore: National Library, War Memorial Park, Esplanade Theater, and more.6.30 pm: Dinner at Lau Pa Sat9.00 pm: Let’s get some drinks just after dinner at a nearby bar.10.00 pm: Head to hotel WHAT TO BRING (Optional) 1. Water2. Footwear for walking3. Cap, Umbrella, Raincoat4. Notebook, Pen, Camera5. Cash for dinner LINKS * FOSSASIA: http://2018.fossasia.org* Twitter: https://twitter.com/fossasia

events.name: How To Build, Lead & Scale an Effective Engineering Team
events.description:
An evening discussing how to build an all stars engineering team. Learn alongside other leaders from across organisations and roles, and discover first-hand how to create your dream team.
Agenda:

Check-in & Networking 6:30 - 7:00 pm
Panel/Lighting Talks 7:00 - 7:45 pm
Q&A and Networking 7:45 - 8:15 pm

Speakers:

Shree Chandramogan, Lead Technical Recruiter, Redmart
Nikolay Sokratov, Head of Engineering, Grab
Abhishek Seth, Head of Engineering - Open Banking (API), ESB, BPM and Customer information platform, Citi
Donghao Huang, Vice President, R&D, Mastercard

Takeaways:

Talk with a panel of experts, hear about their professional experience
Find out how to overcome difficulties in hiring for technical roles.
Learn how to build motivated and empowered engineering team.
Discover key trends for 2018.
events.location: Collision 8, High Street Centre #08-08,, 1 North Bridge Road, Singapore 179094

events.name: Singapore SQL PASS Chapter - March 2018 Meetup
events.description: Dear All, Singapore SQL PASS Chapter meet up for March is scheduled on March 21st ( Wednesday) at 7 PM as usual. This time around, we are lucky to have Kevin Boles aka SQLGuru, 5 time MVP award winner and world renowned expert on T SQL and performance tuning. Session details provided below Agenda: March 21st - 6:45 PM to 7 PM - Registration 7 PM to 8:30 PM - Session titled "Query Plan Deep Dive" by Kevin Boles Location: Microsoft Office, One Marina Boulevard, Level 22 - CF 12 Abstract: Query Plan Deep Dive Another in TheSQLGuru's Deep Dive series! Query plans - the roadmaps of how your query will be handled by the engine. TONs of information for the astute SQL Server user. Lets dig into them and see what we can learn from and about them and also talk about how they can be used to aid our query tuning efforts. Speaker Profile: Kevin Boles is a SQL Server expert, working exclusively with the product since v6.5. With over 25 years of database experience and over 45,000 man hours of SQL Server engine experience, he holds many related certifications, is an MCT and was a SQL Server MVP from 2007 to 2012. Kevin has been a very successful independent consultant for over 20 years. His passion is the relational engine, especially designing, building, analyzing and tuning high-performance database applications.
events.location: Microsoft Singapore, Level 22, Room CF12, One Marina Boulevard, Singapore 018989

events.name: 2018 Informatics Academy Course Preview Sessions
events.description:
Preview for Tech Degree, Advanced Diploma and Diploma Courses
Interested in advancing your prospects in the tech scene but not sure how? Come join us for our free preview sessions to find out more about how an education in tech can boost your employability across multi-faceted sectors!
This is an eventbrite page with multiple course preview dates. Please ensure that you choose the correct dates to RSVP from this page by selecting the correct dates from the blue box on the top right hand corner.
Course Preview Dates:

More about our courses:
Oxford Brookes University Courses
Find out more about how you can earn a top up degree awarded by Oxford Brookes University, ranked in the top 50 young universities in the world by QS World University Rankings 2018.

Bachelor of Science (Honours) in Computer Science (Top Up)
Bachelor of Science (Honours) in Network Computing (Top Up)
Bachelor of Science (Honours) in Computer Games and Animation (Top Up)

IT Pathway Courses
Discover our wide range of courses to suit your educational needs, from diplomas, advanced diplomas and degrees awarded by Informatics Academy, NCC Education and Oxford Brookes University. 

IT & Computing Courses
Networking Computing Courses
Business IT Courses

Gaming and Animation Courses
With gaming and animation now in demand, why not join one of the few established institutions who offer this course to distinguish yourself with a more specialized degree. 

Gaming and Animation Courses

To Sign Up
Course Preview sessions are totally free, so feel free to join us for any of the dates. Simply RSVP to the dates you want through this eventbrite page! On the blue box in the top right corner, select the date you intend to go for. The page will take a while to reload. After that, on the same right hand corner, click the green "Register" box, fill up the form, and you're done!
events.location: National Library Building, 100 Victoria Street, #13-01, Singapore 188064

events.name: Introduction to visual analytics using Tableau
events.description: What does data visualisation mean to you? When you hear the term visual analytics, what does that mean to you? Visualising information has become a hot topic for sure. We have meet up groups like these, companies are using it, and schools are teaching it. Visualising for the sake of showing data in a pretty way is how it was traditionally used. During this meetup, let’s have a discussion around using visuals not as the final presentation product, but instead as a tool to understand where to dig deeper by focusing on the curiosity at hand. To make this fun and engaging, we will be doing some live examples to do an exploration of our own! Speaker Bio: After 2 years of working as a Tableau Consultant in Singapore, KJ Kim is now driving Tableau’s Marketing Outreach Programs in Asia Pacific. This means to work with universities and the communities in Asia to approach analytics with the intent to enable everyone, instead of viewing it as something for only the data experts. • What to bringYourself and preferably with a laptop (with Tableau installed is best). Else just come and listen.
events.location: The Metro @ thebridge, Level 1, Ascent, 2 Science Park Drive, Singapore

events.name: Capture Every Moment (iPhone & DSLR Photography Workshop)
events.description:
Technology nowadays have changed the way how we do the things that we were so used to do back then, such as taking photos.

Back in the old days, in order for us to shoot a good and high quality photo, we need a good and high cost camera, or a good editing software to enhance the outcome of our master piece. Even if we have all these equipments, still we were not guaranteed that we are able to get the outcome that we expected because there is no guide or simple way for us to get started after investing in such a big amount. 



With technology today, iPhone itself have changed the way how people express themselves and share their story through photography. What if we told you that we are able to show you some of the tips and tricks that you can literally turn your iPhone into a professional photo-shooting tool? What if we can show you some of the rules in photo-shooting that allows you to capture things in a right timing and angle that having the professional outcome? Would be interested to know about them? If yes, this workshop is for you!

In this workshop we will be showing you how you can shoot and edit your photos by using the only iPhone itself, and get a good and professional looking outcome, or if you are into DSLR, we will be sharing some of the basic tips and tricks as well. :)

So don't missed out! See you real soon!
events.location: Switch AEON Mall Bandar Dato’ Onn, Lot F29, First Floor, Aeon Mall Kempas, No. 3, Jalan Dato’Onn, Bandar Dato’Onn,, Johor Bahru 81100
